rules.rule_description: 01-Policy duration should be either 1 or 2 years for Domestic Maid Policy.

rules.rule_description: 02-Minimum Policy premium should not be less than $1000.

rules.rule_description: 03-EDG entitiled waiver excess up to $1000. Please check Excess Buy Down.

rules.rule_description: 04-Minimum Policy Remaining excess $300. Need higher Authority to Approve

rules.rule_description: 05-Business Handler does not belong to the Marketing Department entered!
